replies.body: The issue you're experiencing could be due to a problem with your network connecting to our server.  Please check out our [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) guide for a series of steps to get this resolved for you.  If you have any issues afterwards, please let me know and I'd be happy to help!
